name: West Air Flight Training, Inc.
about: At West Air Flight Training, Inc., we are a part 61 flight school dedicated to providing flexible and cost-efficient flight training. With over eight trainer aircraft available, we offer scheduling flexibility and no upfront costs or deposits. Our hourly aircraft rental rates start at $155 for our Basic 172's, and instructor rates are $60 per hour, with discounts available for cash or check payments and military personnel. We pride ourselves on allowing students to progress at their own pace, ensuring a personalized and effective learning experience. Our commitment to safety, flexibility, and affordability makes us an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. We look forward to helping you obtain your pilot certificate.
services:
